content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. Can I please get your name to get started with your request?
Thank you, George! Can you please provide your address so I can make sure we cover your area?
Actually, I'm not interested anymore. Please don't contact me.
Understood, George. We wonâ€™t contact you again. If you ever need our services in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day.
reason: Customer requested not to be contacted.
